commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add theme intended for use in system dialogs
commits.body: It uses “catalog colors” (such as controlTextColor and systemRedColor) for which support has not yet been added to the main theming system, but support is likely to appear during next overhaul of the text layout/rendering engine, and catalog colors will work when the theme is used in the find dialog (for syntax highlight of regular expressions and format strings) starting with TextMate 2.0-rc.20.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Update more themes for HTML/XML scoping changes

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Add 4 testing scopes for writing grammars
commits.body: Been testing these out to help when matching regions in a grammar to better know what is being matched by which rule, etc.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Update themes for HTML/XML scoping changes

commits.author: Stefan Daschek
commits.summary: Add styling for <kbd> tags in web themes.
commits.body: The styling is very similar to how GitHub styles <kbd> tags (for dark themes it has been adapted accordingly).

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Switch to new scopes for embedded source.js
